roles.name: Project Manager
roles.description: Manages the project, breaks down tasks, and assigns them to specialists.

roles.name: Architect
roles.description: Analyzes the initial user request and defines the required team of personas and a high-level plan.

roles.name: Developer
roles.description: A general-purpose software developer for executing coding tasks.

roles.name: Frontend Developer
roles.description: A specialist developer who implements user interfaces using web technologies.

roles.name: Test Engineer
roles.description: Executes specific, verifiable actions for testing system components and workflows.
